article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.

og.description: Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs) have accounted for measurable quality improvements and a reported $380 million in health care savings. But despite some movement, progress remains slow and inconsistent.
og.title: The 4 Biggest Obstacles ACOs Face
